default.SetAmbushMinTime: Set Ambush Script frenquency Time (x= minutes)
default.nonattivesetting: !!!!!!!! CyberScript: No nativeSettings Mod detected, the mod will Not Work!!!!!!!!
default.ammoutdated: CyberScript: AMM Mod Version has Outdated Components that can't be called with CyberScript's SEE system, some props and appearance will not be handled if you have AMM components called in your CM Scripts
default.ammnotfound: CyberScript: No AMM Mod detected, some props and appearance will not be handled correctly if you have scripts that call for both mod components.
default.editor_error_msg: CyberScript Editor Error, Check the questmod.txt (log) for more detail on the Error
default.editor_copy_player_location: Copy XYZ coords from Player Location
default.editor_msg_phone_way: Do not put any requirements if You want that dialog being enabled by default in phone or speak way.
default.need_requirement: Need Requirement to unlock Action List
default.editor_export_warning: You need a `Tag` before testing or exporting!
default.editor_Interact_Timer_msg: Timer is available incase you want to use the interact script in a more 'Immersive' way.
default.editor_Interact_SortTag_msg: SortTag is a grouping method for sorting Interactions by this Tag type. If the interact is for an AV that is flying, put av_Interact
default.editor_Interact_Display_msg: Display is How You want the interaction to be displayed (event_Interact: like a ingame interaction,Place: like a custom Place interaction only, phone_service: like a contact in phone only)
default.editor_Interact_Type_msg: Type is How You want the interaction to be showed (interact: like an ingame Interaction, hint: like a hint interaction (at the bottom of the screen)
default.editor_Event_way_msg: Available ways: world|| init || ambush ||phone_service (world = Always Plays Action List once Trigger(s) are met.|| init = Plays on Loading the game, if it's Triggers are met.|| ambush = Specified, by ambush interval timer, Plays Action List)
default.editor_Fixer_exist: Does this Fixer Exist in the game's story missions and has a set location ?(Wakako, Rita, Regina, Rogue etc.)
default.editor_Fixer_npc_exist: Does this Fixer Exist already as a Side NPC and No set location? (River, Meredith, Judy, Etc.)
default.editor_Faction_AttitudeGroup_msg:
Put attitude group here. 
 It will make the possibility for the mod to determine if an npc, in game, is in a Faction when You look at it.
 You can find the attitude Groups in the path: quest_mod/data/db/attitudegroup
default.editor_Faction_Rivals_msg: Put Faction Tag Rivals here. Path: quest_mod/json/mod/default/factions
default.editor_Faction_SpawnableNPC_msg:
Put TweakIDs of the Entities here, it can be used to make Spawnable NPCs for Ambush type events. 
 You can find the Entity TweakIDs in the path: quest_mod/data/db/CharacterTable.xlsx
default.editor_Faction_SpawnableVehicule_msg:
Put TweakIDs pf the Vehicle here. It can be used to make Spawnable Vehicles for Ambush type events. 
 You can find Vehicle (TweakIDs) in the path: quest_mod/data/db/vehicles.json
default.editor_Faction_VIP_msg:
Put name of the VIPs here, it can be used to make Spawnable VIPs in the actions, catered for them. 
 You can find Character Names in the path: quest_mod/data/db/CharacterTable.xlsx
default.editor_Radio_only_in_car: Can be played only in the car?
default.editor_Radio_tracks_msg:
Put tracks here. 
 name of the sound file should look like `xxxx.mp3`. You need to put the audio file into \Yourmod\song\ folders. This path is just Reference.
default.editor_Radio_warning02: You can't test them until You wrapped it into a mod and add Your song file!
default.editor_Radio_test: Test (it will only show in radio List but nothing will play)
default.editor_Lang_Key_msg:
In any Text Element of framework, you Write the `key` instead of a Text. It will Use the value associated to the `key`. 
 You can use it to Translate the whole CyberScript framework for your mod.
default.editor_Housing_Save: Save Housing and items for mod
default.editor_Help_Sections_msg: Add different section of text for Your help.
default.editor_Place_Enter_copy: Copy Player's XYZ coords for the Entrance
default.editor_Place_Exit_copy: Copy Player's XYZ coords for the Exit
default.editor_Place_Coef_msg01: Coef. is a multiplier for interaction that will cost or give money.
default.editor_Place_Coef_msg02: For example: A Beerthat cost 5 will cost 10 in a Place who have a coef. of 2.
default.editor_Place_isrentable: can have a Business in this Place ? (need to be Bought before)
default.editor_Place_isrentable_msg: To get the Salary from a Business, You need to be in the Place. Possible to get a salary every 5 minutes. Can make your own Salary methods through various Actions made.
default.editor_Place_warning: You need a Requirement (so it needs one trigger too) before testing or exporting!
default.editor_Place_msg02: You need to have a mod with a 'place' script inside it's 'place' folder.
default.editor_Place_msg03: Enabled. As well as be inside the Custom Place. Test your Items and placements before exporting the Items and Housing Furnitures!
default.editor_Node_sort_msg: if (sorttag) is 'metro', the node will be displayed into metro tab in Phone
default.editor_Node_xyz_msg: XYZ coords are the pin-point position of the node
default.editor_Node_gameplayxyz_copy: Copy GameplayXYZ coords from Player Location
default.editor_Node_gameplayxyz_msg: GameplayXYZs are the position of the functionality for the node, Example: Node xyz could be placed at metro entrance, GameplayXYZ is where you can teleport the player to, like the boarding pad.
default.editor_Circuit_Nodes_msg:
Put nodes Tag here. 
 The Order of how You put them is important!
default.editor_Path_mgs: You need a Tag before you Edit the item!
default.editor_Build_Flags_msg:
Put flags here. 
 possible flags:
 cm_version:x.x.x 
 cm_version_strict:x.x.x 
 compile 
 beta 
 amm 
 amm_version:x.x.x 
 amm_version_strict:x.x.x 
 mod:test 
 nfsw 
 mod:test 
 mod_version:test:x.x.x 
 mod_version_strict:test:x.x.x
default.editor_Build_Build: Build Script Folders to Path quest_mod/json/mymod
default.editor_Build_Msg: You need a Tag before You Build it!
default.editor_Setting_Camera_Switch: Toggle between free camera and Player camera
default.editor_Scene_init_action: At 'Start' Actions: (these Actions are intended to Setup your Scene)
default.editor_Scene_end_action: At 'End' Actions: (these Actions are intended to End your Scene)
default.editor_Scene_reset_action: At `Reset` Actions: (these Actions are intended to use before you start a Scene)
default.editor_Scene_msg: You need at least 1 init/Start action, 1 step in the actions, 1 end action and 1 reset action before testing or exporting!
default.npc_spawnnpc_error_vehicle: Vehicle is not allowed, use spawn_vehicle action for it!
default.npc_spawnnpc_error_amm: CyberScript: AMM entity is not allowed to spawn if You don't have AMM
default.npc_car_seat_full: This car is full. Choose another one.
default.see_action_nonode: can't find a node who has this Tag:
default.see_action_nocurrentpoi: can't find the current Poi associated with Player's Position. data:
default.see_action_nomappin: can't find the mappin with this Tag:
default.see_action_nofasttravel: can't find a Fast Travel point with this Tag:
default.see_action_nocurrentfasttravel: can't find a current fast travel point associated with Player's Position
default.see_action_nocurrentmappin: can't find a current custom point associated with Player's Position
default.see_action_noPlace: can't find a Custom Place with this Tag:
default.see_action_noroom: can't find a Custom Room with this Tag:
default.see_action_nocurrentPlace: can't find a current Custom Place associated with Player's Position
default.see_action_nocurrentroom: can't find a current Custom Room associated with Player's Position
default.see_action_Place_price_toohigh: This Place can't be bought, or the price is too high for You!
default.see_action_Place_rent_toohigh: This Place can't be rented or the price is too high for You!
default.see_action_poup_fail: Open,then Close Pause Menu before You Call for a Popup/Controller.
default.see_action_nopath: There is no Path for These Two Nodes...
default.init_renew_setting: CyberScript: Old settings have to be Found and migrated!
default.ui_setting_gameplay_controller: Do you play with gamepad ? (reload save to change effect, this will change the cyberscript loaded keybinding configuration)
default.ui_setting_gameplay_scroll: CyberScript UI Scroll Speed(keep at max)
default.ui_setting_script_entity_affinity_msg: Player's Gang Affinity affects Scripted/Spawned Entities From Script Engine
default.ui_setting_display_hud_xyz: Display XYZ on Map when You hover over a point
default.ui_setting_actions_cleanthemess: Clear all Threads (can't be in car)
default.ui_setting_actions_recalculateaffinity: Recalculate All Affinity from Game Facts
default.ui_setting_actions_recalculateaffinity_m: Recalculate All Affinity (Gang and NPC), it will recalculate it from the Quests You already finished and Your choices
default.ui_setting_actions_cleareaffinity_msg: Clear All Affinity (Gang and NPC), it will put all to 0
default.ui_setting_actions_auto_refresh: Auto Refresh Mods at Pause Menu
default.ui_setting_cheat_infinite_doublejump: Infinite Double Jump (require the Reinforced Tendons)
default.ui_setting_cheat_player_sprint: Player Sprint Multiplier (Save and reload for apply)
default.ui_setting_cheat_player_run: Player Run Multiplier (Save and reload for apply)
default.ui_setting_cheat_jump_height: Player Jump Height Multiplier (Save and reload for apply)
default.ui_setting_cheat_doublejump_height: Player Double Jump Height Multiplier (Save and reload for apply)
default.ui_setting_cheat_player_dodge: Ultra speed less deceleration when dodging and dashing
default.ui_setting_cheat_player_ram: 1000 Ram Recovery Rate + 50 Max Ram on Legendary Lvl 5 Ram Upgrade ++
default.editor_Housing_template_set_center_playe: Set Template Anchor Point from Player Position
default.editor_Housing_apply_template_multi: Apply Template to Current Multiplayer Place
default.editor_Housing_clear_all_multi: Clear Multiplayer Place Items (BE CAREFUL, it delele all !)
default.mission_start_look_map: . Look at you map for track the objective
